mapper.select: SELECT l.lec_time_no lecTimeNo, l.opened_lec_no openedLecNo, l.lecture_yoil lectureYoil, l.lecture_start lectureStart, l.lecture_end lectureEnd, YEAR(o.open_lecture_date) openYear, YEAR(o.close_lecture_date) closeYear, MONTH(o.open_lecture_date) openMonth, MONTH(o.close_lecture_date) closeMonth, DAY(o.open_lecture_date) openDay, DAY(o.close_lecture_date) closeDay, s.student_code studentCode, b.building_name buildingName, c.classroom_name classroomName, t.lecture_name lectureName FROM student_lecture s, opened_lecture o, total_lecture t, lecture_time l, classroom c, building b WHERE s.opened_lec_no = o.opened_lec_no AND t.lecture_code = o.lecture_code AND l.opened_lec_no = o.opened_lec_no AND o.classroom_no = c.classroom_no AND c.building_no = b.building_no AND student_code = #{studentCode}
SELECT opened_lec_no openedLecNo, lecture_yoil lectureYoil, lecture_start lectureStart, lecture_end lectureEnd FROM lecture_time WHERE opened_lec_no = #{openedLecNo}
